title: Vellai Mayil Lyrics Samar Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song:Vellai mayil
Singer: Udith Narayanan, Shwetha
Movie: Samar
Music : Yuvan Shankar Raja
Lyrics: Na. Muthukumar		 Other Song Lyrics
Azhago Azhagu
Poikkaal Kuthirai
Vellai Mayil
Rajaavin Thotathil
Oru Kannil Vegam
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Vellai mayil vennilaavil koothaada ,
oru kanni puyal kangalukul kaathaada,
unnai kadhal endra vaarthayaale
solli solli naan paada .

Ezhu vanna pattaampoochi azhagodu ,
un sollukkaaga kaathirupen uyirodu ,
naan kadhal endra poottukulley
vazhavendum Unnodu ..

Asasai ninaivadi idhu aaraam piraiyadi,
Unnai kandaen oru nodi,
Adhu kadhLil mudhal pasi.
Meesai pulliley ival mutham panithuli ..
Iru idhayam serndhapin ini illai idaiveli..

Vellai mayil vennilaavil koothaada ,
oru kanni puyal kangalukul kaathaada,
unnai kadhal endra vaarthayaale
solli solli naan paada .

Ezhu vanna pattaampoochi azhagodu ,
un sollukkaaga kaathirupen uyirodu ,
naan kadhal endra poottukulley
vazhavendum Unnodu ..

Brindhaavanam, thoongaadhu vaanam ,
Ringaaram paadum vandu
endhan kaiyyodu venum ..
Raakozhiyaai koovuthu moochu,
Karigai noolil neitha
selai mundhaanai aachu.

Sadhai nila unnai nenjiley ,
Vidhaiyena moodi vaikavaa.
Madham pidithaadum yaanaiyaai,
Manakulam venneeraai
vendhum poopookudhey..

Moonraam pirai munnooru megam
soozhndhaalum indha thingal
undhan kannadiyAgum.
Aana varai aanandha mogam ,
Annaandhu paarthaal
endhan kadhal aagaayam aagum.

Mazhai thuli vaanil thanginaal ,
manalveli eeram aagumaa .
Sugam sugam endru kooriye,
Mudhal mudhal mutham ennum
poovai Killi muthaadavaa...

Meesai pulliley ival mutham panithuli ..
Iru idhayam serndhapin ini illai idaiveli.. English Translation
I tried my best :)
